title.rendered: Baker Jobs in Canada for Skilled Foreigners, Salary is $300 – $400 per Day

content.rendered:
Baker Jobs in Canada for Skilled Foreigners, Salary is $300 – $400 per Day – Are you passionate about the art of baking and creating mouthwatering pastries that delight the senses? Do you dream of a career that allows you to bring joy to people’s lives through the magic of baked goods? If so, there is an opportunity for skilled foreigners to be recruited in Canada with a Free Visa application.

Bakers are in high demand in Canada, and you may be able to obtain a Canadian Permanent Residency Visa with or without a work offer.

Thousands of Bakers just like you are relocating to Canada. Learn how to join them.  More Bakers are needed in Canada.  If you are considering relocating to Canada as a Baker, you will find all of the information you want right here.

The companies listed below are currently seeking a talented and skilled Baker/Pastry Chef to join a dynamic team. As a Baker/Pastry Chef, you will play a pivotal role in crafting delectable treats that leave a lasting impression on our customers. Your creativity and expertise will be the cornerstone of our bakery, where innovation and tradition come together in perfect harmony.

Apply Now

Baker/Pastry Jobs in Canada for Skilled Foreigners

Many individuals wanting to relocate to Canada often ask questions like “Will I be able to find work as a Baker in Canada?” In response to this is a Yes Yes. You will get even better and bigger opportunities and job offers. (Of course, like in any nation, each Baker’s degree of training and experience is a key component.)

Companies Demanding for Bakers in Canada by Province

There are eleven (11) provinces in Canada in high demand for Bakers. You can immigrate to any of the eleven provinces in Canada as an experienced Baker with a high chance of finding employment These job opportunities can be found in:

  • Alberta
  • British Columbia
  • Manitoba
  • New Brunswick
  • Newfoundland and Labrador
  • Nova Scotia
  • Ontario
  • Prince Edward Island
  • Quebec
  • Saskatchewan

What is the Salary of a Baker in Canada?

Salaries in Canada are very competitive and, as an experienced Baker, you can expect to earn between $73080 and $100800 per year. This means that in every 21 working days, a Baker with a salary of $300 will earn $6300 per Month and $75600 per year and vice versa.

How to Apply for Baker/Pastry Jobs in Canada for Skilled Foreigner

There are many opportunities for Bakers in Canada for Skilled Foreigners. To apply for this job, research for available NOC Code.

What is NOC Code for Bakers in Canada? NOC Codes in Canada for Bakers are unique job codes used in Canada to identify Bakers working in different bakery/pastry establishments. The NOC code for Baker in Canada is 6332. Different jobs in Canada are identified with their respective NOC code.

After you have access to the NOC code, you will be required to apply the code in your job application.

Duties of a Baker in Canada

  • Bake the mixed dough and batters
  • Draw up a production schedule to determine the type and quantity of goods to produce
  • Ensure the quality of products meets established standards
  • Frost and decorate cakes or other baked goods
  • May hire train and supervise baking personnel and kitchen staff.
  • May oversee sales and merchandising of baked goods
  • May perform receptionist duties and order supplies
  • May train or supervise other hairstylists hairstylist apprentices and helpers.
  • Prepare dough for pies bread rolls and sweet goods batters for muffins cookies and cakes and icings and frostings according to recipes or special customer orders
  • Purchase baking supplies
